level.heading: Licenses required.
level.text: ยง 20-212 Licenses required. a. It shall be unlawful for any person to act as an amusement operator without first having obtained a license therefor. b. It shall be unlawful for any person to operate or for the owner to permit the operation of an amusement device unless such owner has first obtained a license for such amusement device. c. It shall be unlawful for any person to operate, or for the owner to permit the operation of, an amusement arcade or gaming cafe unless such owner has first obtained a license for such amusement arcade or gaming cafe.
